title.rendered: The Ultimate Evolution of the Home Entertainment Center

content.rendered:
The MediaWall is the latest addition to the company’s revolutionary Gemstone™ Wall collection of easy-to-create, interior design concepts that transform walls with stone and brick veneer. The MediaWall is a stunning departure from traditional “entertainment centers” or wall-mounted brackets. It has the look of a magnificent brick or stone wall with special niches for the homeowner’s various media devices.

 

Download Press Release
